statements: SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM patient_records
SELECT patient_name, LENGTH(medical_history) AS medical_history_length FROM patient_records WHERE LENGTH(medical_history) > 100
SELECT DISTINCT EXTRACT(YEAR FROM date_of_birth) AS birth_year FROM patient_records ORDER BY birth_year DESC
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT mr.record_type, mr.record_date, p.patient_name FROM medical_records mr JOIN patients p ON mr.patient_id = p.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT patient_name, record_type, record_date FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE record_type = 'diagnosis';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT patient_name, record_date FROM patients INNER JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id WHERE doctor_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY record_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM healthcare_providers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT record_type, record_date, record_details FROM medical_records WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE patient_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT MR.record_id, MR.record_type, MR.record_date, P.patient_name FROM medical_records MR JOIN patients P ON MR.patient_id = P.patient_id;
SELECT hp.provider_id, hp.provider_name, hp.services_provided, COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM healthcare_providers hp JOIN patients p ON hp.location = p.address GROUP BY hp.provider_id;
SELECT MAX(date_of_birth) AS oldest_patient_dob FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth <= '1990-01-01';
SELECT provider_name, address, phone_number FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_facilities WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='F';
SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_records.diagnosis FROM patients JOIN medical_records ON patients.patient_id = medical_records.patient_id;
SELECT patients.patient_name, medical_facilities.facility_name FROM patients JOIN medical_facilities ON patients.patient_id = medical_facilities.provider_id;
SELECT MAX(date_of_birth) AS oldest_patient_dob FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records;
SELECT patient_id, address FROM patient_records WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT provider_name, location FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, provider_id, appointment_date FROM appointments WHERE status = 'confirmed';
SELECT * FROM patient_records WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patient_records WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT diagnosis, prescription FROM medical_records WHERE record_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT provider_name, location, contact_number FROM healthcare_providers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE status IN ('Scheduled', 'Completed') ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
